data.value: Revert this merged chapter back to individual parts

data.name: Tooltip_MergeChapter
data.value: Merge this chapter with consecutive parts or add to existing merged chapter

data.name: Dialog_DeleteSelected_Content
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected chapters?

data.name: Dialog_DeleteUpscaledSelected_Content
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the upscaled versions of the selected chapters?

data.name: Snackbar_NoMergedSelected
data.value: No merged chapters selected for reversion.

data.name: Dialog_RevertSelectedMerged_Content
data.value: Are you sure you want to revert {0} merged chapters back to their original parts? This will delete the merged chapters and restore the individual parts.

data.name: Snackbar_RevertMerged_Failure
data.value: Failed to revert {0} merged chapters. Check the logs for more information.

data.name: Dialog_DeleteChapter_Content
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this chapter?

data.name: Dialog_RevertMergedChapter_Content
data.value: Are you sure you want to revert this merged chapter back to its original parts? This will delete the merged chapter and restore the individual parts.

data.name: Snackbar_NotifyChange_Failure
data.value: Failed to notify connected service of chapter change for {0}. Check the logs for more information.

data.name: Snackbar_RevertMergedChapter_Success
data.value: Successfully reverted merged chapter and restored {0} individual parts.

data.name: Snackbar_RevertMergedChapter_Failure

data.value: Failed to delete {0}. Check the logs for more information.
